info.headline: Red Flag Warning issued August 04 at 2:18PM MDT until August 04 at 9:00PM MDT by NWS Glasgow
info.description: ...RED FLAG WARNING CONTINUES THROUGH THIS EVENING... .Critical fire weather conditions will persist today with high temperatures in the triple digits and humidity drops to near 10 percent. ...RED FLAG WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 9 PM MDT THIS EVENING FOR HOT TEMPERATURES...GUSTY WINDS...AND LOW RELATIVE HUMIDITY FOR FIRE WEATHER ZONES 120, 122, 134, 135, 136, AND 137... * AFFECTED AREA...Fire Weather Zones 120, 122, 134, 135, 136 and 137. * TIMING...Through 9 pm today. * WINDS...From the southwest and west at 15 to 25 mph with gusts up to 45 mph. Stronger gusts are possible with marginally severe thunderstorms this evening. * RELATIVE HUMIDITY...As low as 10 percent. * TEMPERATURES...Upper 90s to mid 100s. * IMPACTS...Any new fire starts will be difficult to contain as they spread toward the northeast. * ADDITIONAL IMPACTS: Dry lightning is possible with any storms moving through the region today through tonight.
info.instruction: Please advise the appropriate officials or fire crews in these areas of this Red Flag Warning.
